install.description:
Payment Plug-in for RBS Business Gateway.
In order to configure and use this plug-in you must have a RBS Business Gateway account.
Business Gateway is sometimes referred to as "Select Junior".

Business Gateway Integration Guides:
  • http://www.worldpay.com/support/bg/index.php?page=development&c=WW
  • http://www.worldpay.com/support/kb/bg/htmlredirect/rhtml.html
Business Gateway example pages:
  • http://www.worldpay.com/support/bg/index.php?page=development?=integration&subsub=examples&c=WW
Merchant Administration Interface (MAI) guide:
  • http://www.worldpay.com/support/kb/bg/mainavigation/mi.html
Testmode values:
  • 100 for accepted response.
  • 101 for declined response.
Administration server:
  • URL: https://www.worldpay.com/admin
In your admin pages set the Payment Response URL to:
<WPDISPLAY ITEM=MC_callback<
